breakfast.name: Oatmeal
breakfast.preparation: Cook oats in water, stirring regularly. Add honey.

breakfast.name: Boiled Egg
breakfast.preparation: Boil egg in water for 5 minutes. Peel, trying not to burn your fingers. Add butter and salt.

lunch.name: Tuna Sandwich
lunch.preparation: Mix tuna with mayo. Smush onto bread.

supper.name: Spaghetti
supper.preparation: Cook spaghetti noodles in water with oil and salt. Drain and pour sauce on top.

supper.name: Casserole
supper.preparation: Mix everything together and cook at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.
